Title: STUDENT PAPER: Comparative Study of Fault-Proneness Filtering with PMD
Published: International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering
UseOF-SZZ: The faulty and not-faulty modules are extracted from CVS repository using the SZZ
Summary: comparative study of Fault-proneness filtering with PMD.
Outcome: The result of experiment showed that the Fault-proneness filtering obtains higher F1(used to combine recall and precision)
